paragraphs.name: bc74
paragraphs.text: We as human beings were designed to survive, reproduce, protect our young so they can survive and reproduce again. Success has never been part of our thought process or vocabulary until recently in the lifespan of our species.

I get it, you use your phone for an alarm, it is impossible to not see notifications in the morning. Rather than paying them any mind, turn off your alarm and pick up a book or pick out an inspiring article (like mine!) on medium to read.
paragraphs.name: 3e48

paragraphs.text: One of my early mottos in life was “look good, feel good, play good”. When you exercise daily you get all three. You look sexy as fuck, you feel more confident and inevitably you begin to make life your bitch.
paragraphs.name: 52cb
bc74
paragraphs.text: We as human beings were designed to survive, reproduce, protect our young so they can survive and reproduce again. Success has never been part of our thought process or vocabulary until recently in the lifespan of our species.

paragraphs.name: a696
paragraphs.text: My personal definition for meditation is the practice of being in an elevated state of awareness.

paragraphs.name: f059
paragraphs.text: When you are alone for extended periods of time it is impossible to ignore that little voice inside your head. Most people’s minds are primed for negative thoughts so they will do anything to distract themselves….from themselves. This is a commonly traveled pathway to destruction.

paragraphs.name: ee14
paragraphs.text: Taking cold showers forces you very quickly to become less of a pussy and much more of a strong individual. However, to fully reap this benefit you need to do it daily — which as a residual result teaches you discipline.

One of my early mottos in life was “look good, feel good, play good”. When you exercise daily you get all three. You look sexy as fuck, you feel more confident and inevitably you begin to make life your bitch.

paragraphs.text: Great habits which are implementable.One more way which I found very effective is to archieve one “tiny-weeny” improvement everyday.This can be as simple as writing half a paragraph to appreciating someone for something.I have found that these tiny improvements everyday act as biggest motivators rather than one long improvement goal which takes time.My take is “Think Big but Start Small”.
Thanks for the comment. Yeah…cold showers are a tough one, I’m still in the trial phase for that one haha.
paragraphs.name: 1c30

paragraphs.text: Personally, no..I do not believe “success” is another word for “survival”. If simply being alive meant success then you could just stay inside all day, essentially do absolutely nothing but eat, sleep, and shit and be considered a success. See my point?
